metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44272 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in Citadel versions prior to994. When a malicious user sends an instant message with some JavaScriptcode, the script may be executed on the web browser of the victim user.

criterions.comment: webcit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
